e2ee.description: Please enter the encryption key to decrypt and download:

firefoxBlocked.title: ðŸ”’ Encrypted Download Not Available
firefoxBlocked.details: Encrypted downloads larger than {{limit}} require a Chromium-based browser for streaming decryption.
firefoxBlocked.explanation: Large encrypted files cannot be streaming decrypted reliably in Firefox.
firefoxBlocked.useCLI: Or use the FastFileLink CLI
firefoxBlocked.smallFiles: Small encrypted files (<{{limit}}) work on Firefox

retryBlocked.title: Encrypted Download Requires This Page
retryBlocked.message: Direct browser downloads cannot decrypt this file. The decryption must happen in this page with your encryption key.
retryBlocked.solution1: Different Browser: Try Chrome, Edge, or Brave for better compatibility
retryBlocked.solution2Stable: for stable downloads of large encrypted files
retryBlocked.solution3: Wait: The download may still be progressing in the background
